mnd11:3.4: Yo kalaho so vivado, yo vivado so kalaho.
mnd11:3.5: Atha va aparena akarena vivado vuccati kalahassa pubbabhago vivado.
mnd11:3.6: Rajanopi rajuhi vivadanti, khattiyapi khattiyehi vivadanti, brahmanapi brahmanehi vivadanti, gahapatipi gahapatihi vivadanti, matapi puttena vivadati, puttopi matara vivadati, pitapi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitara vivadati, bhatapi bhatara vivadati, bhatapi bhaginiya vivadati, bhaginipi bhatara vivadati, sahayopi sahayena vivadati—
mnd11:3.9: Agarika dandapasuta kayena vacaya kalaham karonti, pabbajita apattim apajjanta kayena vacaya kalaham karonti—
mnd11:4.2: Kalaha ca vivada ca kutopahuta kutojata kutosanjata kutonibbatta kutoabhinibbatta kutopatubhuta, kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhavati kalahassa ca vivadassa ca mulam pucchati, hetum pucchati, nidanam pucchati, sambhavam pucchati, pabhavam pucchati, samutthanam pucchati, aharam pucchati, arammanam pucchati, paccayam pucchati, samudayam pucchati papucchati yacati ajjhesati pasadetiti—
mnd11:5.2: Paridevoti natibyasanena va phutthassa, bhogabyasanena va phutthassa, rogabyasanena va phutthassa, silabyasanena va phutthassa, ditthibyasanena va phutthassa, annatarannatarena va byasanena samannagatassa, annatarannatarena va dukkhadhammena phutthassa, adevo paridevo, adevana paridevana, adevitattam paridevitattam, vaca palapo vippalapo lalappo lalappayana lalappayitattam.
mnd11:5.3: Sokoti natibyasanena va phutthassa, bhogarogasiladitthibyasanena va phutthassa, annatarannatarena va byasanena samannagatassa, annatarannatarena va dukkhadhammena phutthassa, soko socana socitattam, antosoko antoparisoko, antodaho antoparidaho, cetaso parijjhayana domanassam sokasallam.
mnd11:5.6: Yam evarupam macchariyam maccharayanam maccharayitattam veviccham kadariyam katukancukata aggahitattam cittassa—
mnd11:5.8: Api ca, khandhamacchariyampi macchariyam, dhatumacchariyampi macchariyam, ayatanamacchariyampi macchariyam gaho.
mnd11:6.2: Manoti idhekacco manam janeti jatiya va gottena va kolaputtiyena va vannapokkharataya va dhanena va ajjhenena va kammayatanena va sippayatanena va vijjatthanena va sutena va patibhanena va annatarannatarena va vatthuna.
mnd11:6.3: Atimanoti idhekacco param atimannati jatiya va gottena va …pe… annatarannatarena va vatthuna.

mnd11:6.6: Iti samagganam va bhetta, bhinnanam va anuppadata, vaggaramo vaggarato vagganandi vaggakaranim vacam bhasita hoti—

mnd11:6.11: Imassa piyo bhavissami, manapo bhavissami, vissasiko bhavissami, abbhantariko bhavissami, suhadayo bhavissamiti—
mnd11:6.14: Katham ime nana assu, vina assu, vagga assu, dvidha assu, dvejjha assu, dve pakkha assu, bhijjeyyum na samagaccheyyum, dukkham na phasu vihareyyunti—

mnd11:7.4: Imesam atthannam kilesanam mulam pucchati, hetum pucchati, nidanam pucchati, sambhavam pucchati, pabhavam pucchati, samutthanam pucchati, aharam pucchati, arammanam pucchati, paccayam pucchati, samudayam pucchati papucchati yacati ajjhesati pasadetiti—
mnd11:7.6: Ingha bruhi acikkha desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivara vibhaja uttanikarohi pakasehiti—

mnd11:12.3: Piyam vatthum acchedasankinopi vivadanti, acchijjantepi vivadanti, acchinnepi vivadanti.
mnd11:12.4: Piyam vatthum viparinamasankinopi vivadanti, viparinamantepi vivadanti, viparinatepi vivadanti.
mnd11:12.5: Piyam vatthum acchedasankinopi paridevanti, acchijjantepi paridevanti, acchinnepi paridevanti.
mnd11:12.6: Piyam vatthum viparinamasankinopi paridevanti, viparinamantepi paridevanti, viparinatepi paridevanti.
mnd11:12.7: Piyam vatthum acchedasankinopi socanti, acchijjantepi socanti, acchinnepi socanti.
mnd11:12.8: Piyam vatthum viparinamasankinopi socanti, viparinamantepi socanti, viparinatepi socanti.
mnd11:12.9: Piyam vatthum rakkhanti gopenti parigganhanti mamayanti maccharayanti.
mnd11:13.2: Piyam vatthum nissaya manam janenti, piyam vatthum nissaya atimanam janenti.
mnd11:13.3: Katham piyam vatthum nissaya manam janenti?

mnd11:13.5: Evam piyam vatthum nissaya manam janenti.
mnd11:13.6: Katham piyam vatthum nissaya atimanam janenti?
mnd11:13.7: Mayam labhino manapikanam rupanam saddanam gandhanam rasanam photthabbanam, ime pananne na labhino manapikanam rupanam saddanam gandhanam rasanam photthabbananti.
mnd11:13.8: Evam piyam vatthum nissaya atimanam janenti.

mnd11:20.5: Loketi apayaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhatuloke ayatanaloketi—
mnd11:21.2: Asa ca nittha ca kutonidana kutojata kutosanjata kutonibbatta kutoabhinibbatta kutopatubhuta, kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhavati asaya ca nitthaya ca mulam pucchati …pe…
mnd11:21.3: samudayam pucchati papucchati yacati ajjhesati pasadetiti—
mnd11:21.6: Ye narassa parayana honti dipa honti tana honti lena honti sarana honti nittha parayana hontiti—

mnd11:29.3: Asa ca nittha ca ito chandanidana chandasamudaya chandajatika chandapabhavati—

mnd11:34.3: samudayam pucchati papucchati yacati ajjhesati pasadetiti—

mnd11:37.2: Ye capiti ye kodhena ca mosavajjena ca kathankathaya ca sahagata sahajata samsattha sampayutta, ekuppada ekanirodha ekavatthuka ekarammana—
mnd11:37.4: Atha va ye te kilesa annajatika annavihitaka—
mnd11:37.6: Samanena vuttati samanena samitapapena brahmanena bahitapapadhammena bhikkhuna bhinnakilesamulena sabbakusalamulabandhana pamuttena vutta pavutta acikkhita desita pannapita patthapita vivata vibhatta uttanikata pakasitati—
mnd11:41.4: Yamahu loketi yam ahamsu yam kathenti yam bhananti yam dipenti yam voharantiti—
mnd11:42.2: Satasatam nissaya, sukhadukkham nissaya, somanassadomanassam nissaya, itthanittham nissaya, anunayapatigham nissaya chando pahoti pabhavati jayati sanjayati nibbattati abhinibbattatiti—
mnd11:43.2: Rupesuti cattaro ca mahabhuta catunnanca mahabhutanam upadaya rupam.
mnd11:43.4: Yo rupanam bhavo jati sanjati nibbatti abhinibbatti patubhavo—
mnd11:43.7: Yo rupanam khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccata antaradhanam—
mnd11:43.9: Rupesu disva vibhavam bhavancati rupesu bhavanca vibhavanca disva passitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katvati—

mnd11:80.2: samudayam pucchati papucchati yacati ajjhesati pasadetiti—
mnd11:81.2: Kismim asante asamvijjamane natthi anupalabbhamane mamatta natthi na santi na samvijjanti nupalabbhanti, pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddhati—
mnd11:82.2: Kismim vibhute vibhavite atikkante samatikkante vitivatte phassa na phusantiti—
mnd11:86.2: Cakkhunca paticca rupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso.
mnd11:86.3: Cakkhu ca rupa ca rupasmim cakkhusamphassam thapetva sampayuttaka dhamma namasmim.
mnd11:86.5: Sotanca paticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso.
mnd11:86.6: Sotanca sadda ca rupasmim sotasamphassam thapetva sampayuttaka dhamma namasmim.
mnd11:86.8: Ghananca paticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghanavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso.
mnd11:86.9: Ghananca gandha ca rupasmim ghanasamphassam thapetva sampayuttaka dhamma namasmim.
mnd11:86.11: Jivhanca paticca rase ca uppajjati jivhavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso.
mnd11:86.12: Jivha ca rasa ca rupasmim jivhasamphassam thapetva sampayuttaka dhamma namasmim.
mnd11:86.14: Kayanca paticca photthabbe ca uppajjati kayavinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso.
mnd11:86.15: Kayo ca photthabba ca rupasmim kayasamphassam thapetva sampayuttaka dhamma namasmim.
mnd11:86.17: Mananca paticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovinnanam, tinnam sangati phasso.
mnd11:86.18: Vatthu rupam rupasmim, dhamma rupino rupasmim manosamphassam thapetva sampayuttaka dhamma namasmim.
mnd11:87.3: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
mnd11:87.9: Pariggaha icchanidana icchahetuka icchapaccaya icchakarana icchapabhavati—
mnd11:88.3: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
mnd11:88.9: Icchaya asantya asamvijjamanaya natthi anupalabbhamanaya mamatta natthi na santi na samvijjanti nupalabbhanti, pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddhati—
mnd11:89.2: Rupeti cattaro ca mahabhuta catunnanca mahabhutanam upadaya rupam.
mnd11:89.7: “yam kinci rupam sabbam rupam cattari ca mahabhutani catunnanca mahabhutanam upadaya rupan”ti janati passati.
mnd11:90.2: Evam natam katva rupam tireti, aniccato dukkhato rogato gandato sallato aghato abadhato parato palokato itito upaddavato bhayato upasaggato calato pabhanguto adhuvato atanato alenato asaranato rittato tucchato sunnato anattato adinavato viparinamadhammato asarakato aghamulato vadhakato vibhavato sasavato sankhatato maramisato jatidhammato jaradhammato byadhidhammato maranadhammato, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadhammato sankilesikadhammato samudayato atthangamato, assadato adinavato nissaranato tireti.
mnd11:91.2: Evam tirayitva rupe chandaragam pajahati vinodeti byantim karoti anabhavam gameti.
mnd11:91.5: Evam tam rupam pahinam bhavissati ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhamman”ti.
mnd11:92.2: Catasso arupasamapattiyo patiladdhassa rupa vibhuta honti vibhavita atikkanta samatikkanta vitivatta.
mnd11:92.4: Imehi catuhi karanehi rupam vibhutam hoti.
mnd11:93.2: Rupe vibhute vibhavite atikkante samatikkante vitivatte panca phassa na phusanti—
mnd11:97.2: Katham sametassati katham sametassa katham patipannassa katham iriyantassa katham vattentassa katham palentassa katham yapentassa katham yapentassa rupam vibhoti vibhaviyati atikkamiyati samatikkamiyati vitivattiyatiti—
mnd11:98.1: Sukham dukhancapi katham vibhotiti sukhanca dukkhanca katham vibhoti vibhaviyati atikkamiyati samatikkamiyati vitivattiyatiti—
mnd11:99.2: Etanti yam pucchami yam yacami yam ajjhesami yam pasademiti—
mnd11:99.4: Me pabruhiti me pabruhi acikkha desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivara vibhaja uttanikarohi pakasehiti—
mnd11:99.6: Yatha vibhotiti yatha vibhoti vibhaviyati atikkamiyati samatikkamiyati vitivattiyatiti—
mnd11:100.2: Tam janiyamati tam janeyyama ajaneyyama vijaneyyama pativijaneyyama pativijjheyyamati—
mnd11:100.4: Iti me mano ahuti iti me mano ahu, iti me cittam ahu, iti me sankappo ahu, iti me vinnanam ahuti—
mnd11:100.5: tam janiyama iti me mano ahu.
mnd11:104.2: Sannasannino vuccanti ye pakatisannaya thita, napi so pakatisannaya thito.
mnd11:104.3: Visannasannino vuccanti ummattaka ye ca khittacitta, napi so ummattako, nopi khittacittoti—
mnd11:105.2: Asannino vuccanti nirodhasamapanna ye ca asannasatta, napi so nirodhasamapanno, napi asannasatto.
mnd11:105.3: Vibhutasannino vuccanti ye catunnam arupasamapattinam labhino, napi so catunnam arupasamapattinam labhiti—
mnd11:106.2: Idha bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mnd11:106.3: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte akasanancayatanasamapattipatilabhatthaya cittam abhiniharati abhininnameti aruppamaggasamangiti.
mnd11:106.4: Evam sametassa evam patipannassa evam iriyantassa evam vattentassa evam palentassa evam yapentassa evam yapentassa rupam vibhoti vibhaviyati atikkamiyati samatikkamiyati vitivattiyatiti—
mnd11:107.2: Papancayeva papancasankha tanhapapancasankha, ditthipapancasankha, manapapancasankha sannanidana sannasamudaya sannajatika sannapabhavati—
mnd11:111.2: Yam tam apucchimha ayacimha ajjhesimha pasadayimha.
mnd11:111.3: Akittayi noti kittitam pakittitam acikkhitam desitam pannapitam patthapitam vivatam vibhattam uttanikatam pakasitanti—
mnd11:112.2: Annam tam pucchama, annam tam yacama, annam tam ajjhesama, annam tam pasadema, uttarim tam pucchama.
mnd11:112.3: Tadingha bruhiti ingha bruhi acikkha desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivara vibhaja uttanikarohi pakasehiti—
mnd11:113.1: Ettavataggam nu vadanti heke yakkhassa suddhim idha panditaseti.
mnd11:113.2: Eke samanabrahmana eta arupasamapattiyo aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaram vadanti kathenti bhananti dipayanti voharanti.
mnd11:113.3: Yakkhassati sattassa narassa manavassa posassa puggalassa jivassa jagussa jantussa indagussa manujassa.
mnd11:113.4: Suddhinti suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim.
mnd11:113.5: Idha panditaseti idha panditavada thiravada nayavada hetuvada lakkhanavada karanavada thanavada sakaya laddhiyati—
mnd11:113.6: ettavataggam nu vadanti heke yakkhassa suddhim idha panditase.
mnd11:114.2: Udahu eke samanabrahmana eta arupasamapattiyo atikkamitva samatikkamitva vitivattetva etto arupasamapattito annam uttarim yakkhassa suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim vadanti kathenti bhananti dipayanti voharantiti—
mnd11:118.1: Ettavataggampi vadanti heke, yakkhassa suddhim idha panditaseti.
mnd11:118.2: Santeke samanabrahmana sassatavada, eta arupasamapattiyo aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaram vadanti kathenti bhananti dipayanti voharanti.
mnd11:118.3: Yakkhassati sattassa narassa manavassa posassa puggalassa jivassa jagussa jantussa indagussa manujassa.
mnd11:118.4: Suddhinti suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim, muttim vimuttim parimuttim.
mnd11:118.5: Idha panditaseti idha panditavada thiravada nayavada hetuvada lakkhanavada karanavada thanavada sakaya laddhiyati—
mnd11:118.6: ettavataggampi vadanti heke yakkhassa suddhim idha panditase.
mnd11:119.1: Tesam paneke samayam vadanti, anupadisese kusalavadanati tesamyeva samanabrahmananam eke samanabrahmana ucchedavada bhavatajjita vibhavam abhinandanti, te sattassa samam upasamam vupasamam nirodham patipassaddhinti vadanti, yato kim, bho, ayam atta kayassa bheda ucchijjati vinassati na hoti param marana, ettavata anupadisesoti.
mnd11:119.2: Kusalavadanati kusalavada panditavada thiravada nayavada hetuvada lakkhanavada karanavada thanavada sakaya laddhiyati—
mnd11:119.3: tesam paneke samayam vadanti anupadisese kusalavadana.
mnd11:123.3: Upanissitati sassataditthinissitati natva, ucchedaditthinissitati natva, sassatucchedaditthinissitati natva janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katvati—
mnd11:124.3: Monam vuccati nanam …pe… sangajalamaticca so muni.
mnd11:124.4: Muni sassataditthinissitati natva, ucchedaditthinissitati natva, sassatucchedaditthinissitati natva janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva.
mnd11:124.5: So vimamsiti pandito pannava buddhima nani vibhavi medhaviti natva muni nissaye so vimamsi.
mnd11:124.6: Natva vimutto na vivadametiti natva janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva.
mnd11:124.8: “Sabbe sankhara anicca”ti natva janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva mutto vimutto parimutto suvimutto accantaanupadavimokkhena.
mnd11:124.11: “yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti natva janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva mutto vimutto parimutto suvimutto accantaanupadavimokkhenati—
mnd11:124.13: Na vivadametiti na kalaham karoti, na bhandanam karoti, na viggaham karoti, na vivadam karoti, na medhagam karoti.
mnd11:124.15: “evam vimuttacitto kho, aggivessana, bhikkhu na kenaci samvadati, na kenaci vivadati, yanca loke vuttam tena ca voharati aparamasan”ti—
mnd11:125.2: Bhavabhavayati bhavaya kammabhavaya punabbhavaya kamabhavaya, kammabhavaya kamabhavaya punabbhavaya rupabhavaya, kammabhavaya rupabhavaya punabbhavaya arupabhavaya, kammabhavaya arupabhavaya punabbhavaya punappunabbhavaya punappunagatiya punappunaupapattiya punappunapatisandhiya punappunaattabhavaya punappunabhinibbattiya na sameti na samagacchati na ganhati na paramasati nabhinivisati.
mnd11:125.3: Dhiroti dhiro pandito pannava buddhima nani vibhavi medhaviti—
